updates.content: Imgix is our service provider for asset caching and manipulation. They are seeing errors that are affecting our asset uploads and serving. Read all the details on their status page: https://status.imgix.com/incidents/bg0msyrz9f17
Imgix has rolled out a fix and is monitoring the situation which should be back to normal for most users: https://status.imgix.com/incidents/bg0msyrz9f17
Both rendering times and rendering errors have return to normal.
